item.title: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. Declines 2.71% Amid Mixed Technical Signals and Hold Upgrade
item.description: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. (GNFC) closed the week ending 9 January 2026 at Rs.479.65, down 2.71% from the previous Friday’s close of Rs.493.00. Time: 40 minutes ago

item.title: Hindustan Copper Ltd Falls 3.89%: 5 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Hindustan Copper Ltd experienced a volatile week from 5 to 9 January 2026, closing down 3.89% at Rs.520.95 despite hitting multiple 52-week highs early in the week. The stock outperformed the Sensex’s 2.62% decline, reflecting mixed investor sentiment amid strong volume surges and sector headwinds. Key events included a series of new highs on 5, 6, and 7 January, followed by profit-taking and sector weakness that pressured prices towards the week’s close. Time: 40 minutes ago
